snippet.title: WITHERING REALMS - Official Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3441990

A ghost and her doll guardian explore the mysterious town of Penwyll and the sprawling graveyards, tombs, caves and rotting estates that surround it in this Horror Action RPG from the creator of Withering Rooms.

Early access coming to Steam Fall 2025, full release and consoles to follow.

More info: https://witheringrealms.com
